verse: स्तम्भः स्वेदोऽथ रोमांचः स्वरभेदोऽथ वेपथुः ।  वैवर्ण्यमश्रू प्रलय इत्यष्टों सात्विकः स्मृताः ॥ (भ.र.सि.)

terms.रोमांचः: romānchaḥ: goosebumps, hair standing on end
terms.सात्विकः: sātvikaḥ: originating from sattva (pure, harmonious, virtuous) guna

meaning: Meaning:In Brahma Sutras, eight manifestations originating from the sattva guna (the quality of purity and harmony) are known. They are:These eight manifestations are considered as expressions of the sattva guna and are observed in various contexts.
